<MethodEndpoint

Determines which experiment variants are applicable to a given context, used for experiment evaluation and variant selection.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"juspay"},"required":true},{"name":"x-tenant","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"context":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"description":"Represents conditional criteria used for context matching. Keys define dimension names and values specify the criteria that must be met.","title":"Condition"},"identifier":{"type":"string"}},"required":["context","identifier"],"title":"ApplicableVariantsRequestContent"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
